description: Archive 4 MCP servers (coderef, hello-world, scriptboard, chrome-devtools) using coderef-context MCP tools to analyze the servers before archiving. This plan includes intelligent code context analysis.
goal: Remove deprecated MCP servers from auto-loading configuration and archive their directories, with full code analysis via coderef-context to understand dependencies and impact
requirements: Use coderef-context tools to scan all 4 servers
Analyze dependencies and relationships between servers
Identify any cross-references that need cleanup
Commit changes with detailed impact analysis
